      • selectLoan

        @PostMapping(value="/select")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<com.hcl.mortgage.dto.ResponseDto> selectLoan(@RequestParam
                                                                                                                           java.lang.Integer userId,
                                                                                                                           @RequestParam
                                                                                                                           java.lang.Integer loanId)
                                                                                                                    throws com.hcl.mortgage.exception.LoanNotValidException,
                                                                                                                           com.hcl.mortgage.exception.UserNotFoundException
        Parameters:
        userId - we need userid to get the particular user
        loanId - we need loanId to get the loan details
        Returns:
        ResponseDto returning the responseDto containing the applied loan
        Throws:
        com.hcl.mortgage.exception.LoanNotValidException - if loanId is not a valid loan for that user
        com.hcl.mortgage.exception.UserNotFoundException - if userId is not present in the database
